item.description:
Title: Trading Options by Mickey Moores, President, Online Trading Academy, Boston

Please RSVP!

We are overdue for an options talk and this talk gives us all a chance to meet the man behind the Online Trading Academy. So we kill two birds with one stone! Mickey Moores' talk is the only presentation on the agenda.

Mickey Moores will discuss the use of options to increase trading profits and reduce risk. His talk will include the following:
  • Buying options as a stock substitute
  • What drives options prices
  • Profiting from time decay
  • Playing option volatility, a sentiment indicator
  • Advantages and risks of trading options
  • Using spread trades to reduce risk



Bio: Mickey Moores has been educating traders since 2001, emphasizing equity options and portfolio risk management. In 2004 he became the lead equity options instructor for the largest stock market educational company in the country. Last April, Mickey became the President of Online Trading Academy- Boston in Norwood, MA, which educates students on trading equities, options, futures and forex.

To join our Google Group - BostonIBD - for online discussion go to
http://groups.google.... .

To join in our virtual trading, go to this link for instructions and signup links:
http://groups.google....

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Make your own decisions about investing your money. Investment ideas and recommendations made in our meetings and our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.
item.name: Boston IBD Guest Talk: Trading Options by Mickey Moores
